channel.description:

Dragon Claws requirement 60defence...how do i change to 60 attack

item.title: Dragon Claws requirement 60defence...how do i change to 60attack
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to wearing.java and search for

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) {

and under it add the

if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon_Claws")) { return 60;

Dragon_Claws might not work , the next option is to name it “Dragon Claws”

depends on how it is called in your item.cfg ( with or without “”"_""" )

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Claws requirement 60defence...how do i change to 60attack
